name: West Bend Programmable Rice & Grain Cooker with 7 Preset Functions, Includes Delay Start and Keep Warm, Features Easy View Window & Steam Basket, 12 Cups Cooked (6 Uncooked), Black
short_description: LARGE CAPACITY: Up to 12 cup (six cup uncooked) capacity is perfect for family meals VERSATILE: 7 preset functions: White Rice, Brown Rice, Multigrain Rice, Quinoa, Oatmeal, Keep Warm, Delay Start USER-FRIENDLY: LED display is easy to read DELAY START: 24-hour programmable delay timer for flexible meal planning GLASS WINDOW: Easy-view glass window on the lid to watch your favorite recipe prepare to perfection
product_description: Make grains your way with the West Bend 12 Cup Programmable Rice Cooker. Whether you want perfectly fluffy rice, delicious quinoa or nutritious oatmeal, this multi-function rice cooker can do it all. The unit features an easy-to-read LED display and five convenient presets functions: White Rice, Brown Rice, Multigrain Rice, Quinoa and Oatmeal, which take the guesswork out of cooking. The auto keep warm preset keeps your food warm when preparing multiple dishes or until your meal is ready to eat. The 24-Hour Programmable Delay Timer is ideal for flexible meal planning, allowing you to plan ahead and set your desired start time while you're busy doing other things. Steam vegetables, meats and more using the included steam basket. The rice spoon and measuring cup make meal prep easy. The easy-view glass window on the lid lets you see your food while it is cooking without opening the unit. The dishwasher-safe removable cooking pot, steam basket and ladle make cleanup a breeze. This compact rice cooker will fit nicely on your countertop and has a handy detachable power cord for easy storage. Cook up to 12 cups of rice with the West Bend 12 Cup Programmable Rice Cooker.

name: BLACK+DECKER 16-Cup Rice Cooker, 8-Cup Uncooked Rice, Steaming Basket, Removable Non-Stick Bowl, One Touch, Keep Warm
short_description: 16-CUP CAPACITY - The BLACK+DECKER 8 Cup Rice Cooker can cook up to 8 cups of uncooked rice which yields up to 16 cups of cooked rice. Prepare smaller quantities if desired, as little as 3 cups of cooked rice. Use included guide for rice and water quantities for optimal results. STEAMING BASKET - The included steaming basket lets you make healthy meals with vegetables, fish, and more. Also includes measuring cup and spoon REMOVABLE NONSTICK BOWL - The nonstick cooking bowl is completely removable for easy dishwasher cleanup; the tempered glass lid with hanger allows for easy serving and clean countertops AUTOMATIC KEEP WARM - The rice stays ready for serving! The unit automatically switches to the “keep warm” function after cooking is complete, keeping fluffy rice ready to serve long after cooking TWO HEAT SETTINGS - Cooking stops when all moisture is absorbed, then the rice cooker switches to warming mode
product_description: The BLACK+DECKER 16-Cup Rice Cooker makes it easy to create rice and more for family dinners and large gatherings. The nonstick, removable cooking bowl features an extra-large capacity for rice and grains, soups and stews, or even oatmeal and pasta. The included steaming basket increases your cooking options with healthy preparation of fish, veggies, and more. Plus, the cooking bowl, tempered glass lid, and included accessories are all dishwasher-safe for easy cleanup.

name: COMFEE' Compact Rice Cooker, 6-in-1 Stainless Steel Multi Cooker, Slow Cooker, Steamer, Saute, and Warmer, 2 QT, 8 Cups Cooked(4 Cups Uncooked), Brown Rice, Quinoa and Oatmeal, 6 One-Touch Programs
short_description: Multifunctional - Use-6 digital cooking programs including white rice, brown rice, steam, slow cook, quinoa and oatmeal functions. Compact Capacity -8 cup cooked (2 Qt) capacity yields up to 8 cups of cooked rice. Its space saving design is perfect for preparing small meals or tasty sides. Effortless Operation - The Multi Use Programmable Rice Cooker is user friendly with digital panel & LED display, features 6 One-Touch Programs, automatically switches to keep warm for 12 hours and 12 hour delay timer is designed for flexible meal planning. Easy to Clean - Stainless steel external housing is easy to wipe clean. With the non-stick coating, the cleaning of the inner pot is like a breeze. The inner pot and all of the included accessories are dishwasher safe. Safety Features - Built-in Overheating Protection. Made of BPA-Free Food Grade Material. Cool touch handle ensures your safety when you open the cooker. Warranty from COMFEE' - This programmable electric rice cooker is made of BPA-free food grade material. UL certificate approved. COMFEE' will provide 1 year manufacturer warranty together with your purchase.
product_description: 6-in-1 Stainless Steel Multi Cooker, Slow Cooker, Steamer, Saute, and Warmer, 2 QT, 8 Cups Cooked(4 Cups Uncooked), Brown Rice, Quinoa and Oatmeal, 6 One-Touch Programs.

name: COMFEE' Rice Cooker 12 Cups Cooked/6 Cups Uncooked, Portable Non-Stick Rice Maker, Japanese Rice Cooker with Fuzzy Logic Technology, 24-Hour Timer Delay, 11 Presets, Steamer, Fast Rice Cooker, Grain Cooker, Black
short_description: Fuzzy Logic Technology: Allows this rice maker to sense the moisture content of the rice, adjust the temperature and cooking time accordingly. Results in perfectly cooked fluffy rice every time, without the need for manual adjustments or guesswork. It also helps the rice maker cook other types of grains and dishes to perfection by adjusting the cooking parameters to the specific needs of the food. Cooking Versatility: The Japanese rice cooker with 11 programs to suit eating habits like white rice, brown rice, sushi, pasta, soup, stew, saute, steamed veggies. It can easily meet the needs of families and gatherings. Effortless Operation: The Multi Use Programmable Rice Cooker is user-friendly with LCD Touch control panel, automatically switches to keep warm. 30 minutes fast cook can be flexible with your cooking plans. 6 Cups Capacity: This compact rice cooker can cook up to 6 cups of uncooked rice (12 cups cooked), perfect for families. The portable size and convenient handle, make it easy to store , and also convenient to take out camping. Easy to Clean: With the non-stick coating, the cleaning of the inner pot is like a breeze. All the inner pot, steam valve base and upper lid are removeable for hand-wash. Accessories and Warranty: Include measurement cup and rice spoon. COMFEE' will provide 1 year manufacturer warranty together with your purchase.
product_description: COMFEE' rice cooker has a compact size but ultimate versatility. 6 cups(uncooked) capacity, fuzzy logic technology and multi-function release your cooking talent easily. Cleaning is a breeze with non-stick inner pot and removable inner lid. Handle design allows you lifting it up and storing easily!

name: Toshiba Mini Rice Cooker, 3 Cups Uncooked Small Rice Cooker, Steamer & Warmer, With Fuzzy Logic And One-Touch Cooking, 24 Hour Delay Timer And Auto Keep Warm Feature, White
short_description: Multi-Function - This mini rice cooker cooks a variety of dishes, not just rice. Features 8 cooking functions, including White Rice, Quick Cook, Brown Rice, Mixed Grain, Slow Cook, Porridge, Cake, and Egg. This sticky rice cooker also makes soups, stews, oatmeal, cakes, and more. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned chef, this Toshiba rice cooker 6 cup Cooked offers great versatility and convenience Highly Versatile – This small rice cooker can make a variety of rice types, including brown rice, jasmine rice, sushi rice, white rice, basmati rice, and wild rice, as well as grains like oatmeal, quinoa, mixed grain, and more. This 3 cup rice cooker is perfect for families or individuals who want to cook multiple servings of rice, while still being compact enough to fit comfortably on your kitchen counter Fuzzy Logic Rice Cooker - Allows this Japanese rice cooker to sense the moisture content of the rice and adjust the temperature and cooking time accordingly. Results in perfectly cooked fluffy rice every time, without the need for manual adjustments or guesswork. It also helps the rice maker cooker cook other types of grains and dishes to perfection by adjusting the cooking parameters to the specific needs of the food Easy To Use- This electric rice cooker 3 cup is designed with intuitive control panel features a large LED display for quick and effortless programming. Keep Warm/Reheat function keeps your rice warm and delicious for hours, the Delay Timer allows you to schedule your cooking up to 24 hours in advance. Accessories included: measuring cup, spatula, and soup ladle. Easy To Clean-Inner pot with non-stick coating and not recommended dishwasher safe and should be washed with mild soap and soft cloth. The steam valve located on the top of the lid can be easily removed for cleaning. Steam vent cap is also removable for easy cleaning Safe Hassle-Free Cooking – Detachable power cord prevents accidents caused by entanglement. Lid locks firmly in place during cooking to prevent spills. Thermal fuse prevents overheating. Steam vent cap prevents hot steam from escaping during cooking. Automatic shut-off turns off heating element when cooking is done. Compared to other high-end rice cookers, this Toshiba model is a great option for those on a budget who still want a quality sushi rice cooker
product_description: Toshiba Japanese-Style Mini Rice Cooker - Industry leading 3D Fuzzy Logic cooking technology and intelligent 6-step cooking process. 8 Pre-programmed settings to cook white rice, brown rice, mixed grain, quick rice, slow cook, porridge, saute, and steam perfectly for desired texturess, flavor and aroma. 3-6 Cups of Cooked Rice (3-cups uncooked rice) ideal for a small family.；The product voltage arrange is 110V

name: Instant Pot Zest 8 Cup One Touch Rice Cooker, From the Makers of Instant Pot, Steamer, Cooks Rice, Grains, Quinoa and Oatmeal, 8-cup cooked/4-cup uncooked, No Pressure Cooking Functionality
short_description: 4 SMART PROGRAMS: make cooking your favorite rice, oatmeal, and grains to fluffy perfection super-fast and one touch easy! STEAM VEGGIES: Easily steam veggies, fish and more! DOUBLES AS A WARMER: Keep foods nice and warm during pot lucks, parties, picnics and more! 8 CUP CAPACITY: 4-Cup (Uncooked)/8-Cup (Cooked). Its compact capacity is perfect for preparing small individual meals, or meal prep side dishes. ACCESSORIES INCLUDED: In addition to the non-stick ceramic coated pot, the Zest Plus also comes with a dishwasher-safe steamer tray, rice measuring cup and rice spoon. SAFETY FEATURES: Includes over 10 safety features, plus overheat protection and safe-locking lid. DISCOVER AMAZING RECIPES: Includes the free Instant Brands Connect App, where you can find new recipes to create quick favorites and prepare delicious meals, available for iOS and Android.
product_description: From the makers of Instant Pot, the Instant Zest Rice and Grain Cooker with 8-cup capacity is the perfect combination of value, convenience and cooking ease. Smart cooking programs help you save time and ensure dishes turn out exactly as you want them to. Fine-tune and save cooking times and temperatures that suit your family’s tastes. In addition to the smart program presets for white and brown rice, quinoa and oatmeal, you can cook any type of rice and grain fast and perfectly — from millet, farro and freekeh, to polenta, barley, rice pudding and more. Even hearty grains like spelt and wheat berries, which typically require lots of cooking time. More than just a rice cooker, the Instant Zest quickly steam veggies, fish, dumplings, tamales, cabbages, wontons and more with ease. Bright, bold display and status indicators let you know exactly where your food is in the cooking process. Delay start and keep warm functions make sure your rice, grains and more are ready when you are.

name: Aroma Housewares Aroma 6-cup (cooked) 1.5 Qt. One Touch Rice Cooker, White (ARC-363NG), 6 cup cooked/ 3 cup uncook/ 1.5 Qt.
short_description: Perfectly prepares 2 to 6 cups of any variety of cooked rice Simple, one-touch operation with automatic Keep-Warm Great for soups, jambalaya, chili and so much more! Full-view tempered glass lid Easy-to-clean, nonstick removable inner pot Includes Rice Measuring Cup and Serving Spatula
product_description: "Enjoy easy home cooking with the AROMA 6-Cup (Cooked) Pot-Style Rice Cooker. Restaurant-quality rice. Healthy meals. Delicious one-pot dishes. Prepare all this and more at the flip of a switch! Aroma takes the cook out of home cooking - turning kitchen time into your time! Help the kids with homework, get creative at play time or pick up that novel you've been waiting to dive into. All while delivering hot, hearty and healthy meals the entire family will love.This convenient cooker's compact capacity perfectly cooks 2 to 6 cups of any variety of rice. Once the rice has finished, it will automatically switch to Keep-Warm so there's no need for monitoring or stirring. It's also perfect for oatmeal, chili, jambalaya, soups and so much more! And when the cooking is done, the inner cooking pot and all accessories remove for easy cleanup in the dishwasher."

name: Hamilton Beach Digital Programmable Rice and Slow Cooker & Food Steamer, 20 Cups Cooked (10 Cups Uncooked), 14 Pre-Programmed Settings for Sear Sauté, Hot Cereal, Soup, Nonstick Pot, Stainless Steel
short_description: Easy one-pot meals: versatile appliance makes rice, slow cooks, sautés, sears, Steams, prepares hot cereal and vegetables, and more. 14 pre-programmed settings: Includes keep Warm and delay start settings for Extra convenience. Large 4. 5 quart capacity: can prepare up to 20 cups of cooked rice. Rice rinsing/ steaming basket included: dual-purpose basket makes it easy to rinse rice, which prevents clumping during cooking, and steam healthy foods while rice cooks below. Easy clean up: nonstick inner pot is removable and dishwasher safe.
product_description: Save storage space and enjoy complete cooking flexibility With the Hamilton Beach digital Multi cooker. With a 4. 5 quart Capacity, It combines the functions of a rice cooker, slow cooker, food steamer and more, making it perfect for easy one-pot meals.

name: Digital 20-Cup Rice Cooker & Steamer, 5-Qt One-Touch 8-in-1 Cooker w/Delay Timer & Warm
short_description: Family-Sized Capacity: 5-quart inner pot cooks up to 20 cups of fluffy rice, perfect for large families or meal prep. Enjoy anywhere from 2 to 20 cups cooked rice without overflow or mess 8 Smart Cooking Presets: One-touch programs for white rice, brown rice, quinoa, oatmeal, bulgur, barley, sauté, and steam take the guesswork out. Achieve perfect textures for grains, hot cereals, or even soups at the press of a button Convenient Delay & Safety Features: Programmable 24-hour delay start lets you schedule meals in advance for busy days. Automatic Keep Warm mode kicks in after cooking to maintain freshness, and auto shut-off provides peace of mind Dual Cooking & Healthy Steaming: Includes a non-stick inner pot for rice and a bonus steam tray that nests above. Cook rice while simultaneously steaming veggies, fish, or dumplings for well-rounded, one-pot meals – no extra cookware needed Quality Design, Easy Cleanup: The food-grade inner pot and sealed locking lid ensure even heat, lock in moisture and nutrients, and prevent spills. Non-stick coating and removable accessories make cleanup a breeze, and the compact countertop design saves kitchen space

name: Instant Pot 20-Cup Rice Cooker, Rice and Grain Multi-Cooker with Carb Reducing Technology without Compromising Taste or Texture, From the Makers of Instant Pot, Includes 8 Cooking Presets
short_description: 8 Cooking Functions: Make rice, grains, quinoa, mixed grains, slow-cooked dishes, sautéed meals, steamed recipes, and keep food warm for up to 10 hours—all in one appliance User-Friendly Presets: 8 smart cooking programs take the guesswork out of meal preparation.​ CarbReduce Technology: Enjoy rice with up to 40% fewer carbs and sugar* while keeping the taste and texture right where they should be: perfect Modern, Space-Saving Design: Sleek matte finish, space-saving shape—looks good, fits anywhere, and keeps your counter clutter-free Easy Water Measurement: Built-in level marks inside the CarbReduce steam basket make prep simple and foolproof Quick Cleanup: No more fighting about who has to do the dishes. The dishwasher-safe non-stick cooking pot, stainless steel CarbReduce steam basket, and removable lid make clean up a breeze Power Packed Performance: 860 watts, 120 V 60 Hz, UL & ULC Listed
product_description: Fluffier grains, fewer carbs, zero stress. With CarbReduce, smart presets, and Keep Warm, the Instant Pot Grain and Rice Multi-Cooker keeps it easy from first scoop to last.
